channel.title: Michael Peter Hartmann
channel.description: Recent content on Michael Peter Hartmann

item.title: My Bag Contents After Two Years of Travel
item.description: I’ve been all over the place in the last couple years, and my bag has changed a lot in that time. I originally wrote about what I was packing at the beginning of my travels and I thought a follow up would be interesting. I’ve added a few things and taken some away and compared to my original post I’ll be going into more detail about why I chose each item.

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test for my first hugo post and template.

item.title: Going Back To Thailand, 6 Years Later
item.description: I go back to Thailand after teaching there several years ago to discover if I still like it

item.title: A Brief Recap of My Time in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City
item.description: A log of the things I did and saw in the two largest cities in Vietnam.

item.title: A Short and Varied Trip to Cambodia
item.description: An account of my two week trip to Cambodia, visiting Phnom Penh and Siem Reap.

item.title: My Veitnam Motorcycle Trip
item.description: A day by day account of my 2,500km motorycle ride from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City

item.description: My notes after spending 2 months in Taiwan

item.title: The First(ish) Week in Taiwan
item.description: These are a few notes and observations after my first full week in Taiwan

item.title: Packing For Indefinite Travel Lengths
item.description: I’m going travelling, so what should I pack and how should I carry it all? I talk through my options and reasoning behind my packing plan. Be warned, it’s long and rambly.
